org.matsim.vis.otfvis.interfaces

Interface OTFServer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OTFLiveServer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OnTheFlyServer, OTFFileReader

    public interface OTFServer
    OTFServerRemote is the one most important interface for the communication between client and server. All methods necessary for data exchange are bundled in this interface.
    Author:
    dstrippgen
